remarks: The inner product of a pre-Hilbert space is linear in its left argument.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:

phllmhm $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ A e. V ) -> G e. ( W LMHom ( ringLMod ` F ) ) ) $.
